title: Elegance Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run South Indian restaurant with also an international menu. Will accommodate special requests including gluten-free and vegan. Sits off the main highway after a Shell station on the ocean side and before Pigion Point north of Shell station on west side of the road, small parking lot.
